title: His Royal Highness
creator_credit: F.W. Thring and Efftee Film Productions
brief_description: George Wallace plays a stage-hand who dreams that he is King. This is Efftee’s third feature and the first all Australian talking musical film. Some lively songs and an ingenious comic performance by George Wallace. Cast also includes Mona Barlee, Marshall Crosby, Lou Vernon.
